response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-withdrawnMarke: Marking quality issue identified in this QIG This will not prevent you from marking other QIGs where you are approved to mark
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-maximumConcurr: You have reached your concurrent limit
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-noResponseAvai: There are currently no responses available to download Please check again later.
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-concurrentLimi: {0} responses have been downloaded. It is not possible to download further responses as there are no more responses available.
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-markingLimitRe: Only {0} responses have been downloaded as you have reached your marking target.
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-maximumAllocat: No responses have been downloaded as you have reached your marking target.
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-sessionClosed: It is not possible to download responses to mark as the session has been closed.

approval-status-changed-dialog.body: Your approval status on this question group has changed and you cannot download or submit responses until your team leader provides you with feedback. You can still review any responses which have already been downloaded into your worklist. This will not prevent you from marking other QIGs where you approved to mark.
approval-status-changed-dialog.body-quality-feedback: Your approval status on this QIG has changed and you cannot download or submit responses until you have accepted feedback on this seed, and your team leader has provided you with further feedback about your marking. This will not prevent you from marking other QIGs where you approved to mark.
approval-status-changed-dialog.body-relatedQIG: Not all responses have been submitted because you have not yet been approved for marking (Do Not Translate)
approval-status-changed-dialog.body-withdrawn: You cannot submit responses because you have been withdrawn from the marking team for this QIG.

response-data.amd-tooltip: The total difference between the marks you awarded and the definitive marks set by the senior examiner team, calculated across each individual question item
response-data.tmd-tooltip: The difference between the overall total mark you awarded, and the overall total mark set by the senior examiner team
response-data.additional-objects-not-annotated-icon-to: Response has additional pages that must be annotated before marks can be submitted
response-data.exceptions-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more linked exceptions. None of these will prevent the response being submitted when marking is complete. Click icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.blocking-exceptions-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more linked exceptions. You will not be able to submit the response until these exceptions have been resolved and closed. Click this icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.resolved-exceptions-icon-tooltip: This response has {0} exceptions that are resolved and waiting for you to review and close. None of these will prevent the response being submitted when marking is complete. Click this icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.resolved-and-blocking-exceptions-icon-to: This response has {0} exceptions that are resolved and waiting for you to review and close. You will not be able to submit the response until you have closed these exceptions. Click this icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.messages-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more linked messages. Click this icon to view the messages.
response-data.unread-messages-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more unread linked messages. Click this icon to view the messages.
response-data.supervisor-remark-decision-not-specified: This response cannot be submitted until the candidate's final mark, and the reason, is selected
response-data.not-all-files-viewed-icon-tooltip: Not all files have been viewed in this response
response-data.zoning-exceptions-icon-tooltip: The zoning of this candidate's script is being reviewed following an exception raised against another response. Please be aware that the image zones displayed may be changed as a result of this exception. You will be unable to submit this response until this exception is resolved.

auto-approved-dialog.summary-stm-standardisation: Your second qualification marking is completed.
auto-approved-dialog.summary-second-standardisation: Your second qualification marking is completed.
auto-approved-dialog.body-standardisation: You have been automatically approved to start live marking. You can look at your submitted qualification and practice responses at any time by selecting the relevant worklist.
auto-approved-dialog.body-excess-standardisation-responses-re: You have been automatically approved to start live marking. Your qualification marking is now complete and the remaining open qualification responses in your worklist have been removed. You can look at your submitted qualification responses at any time by selecting the relevant worklist.
auto-approved-dialog.body-stm-standardisation: You have been automatically approved to start live marking. You can refer back to your submitted qualification and practice responses at any time by clicking on the required response type on the side of the work list screen
auto-approved-dialog.body-excess-second-standardisation-respo: You have been automatically approved to start live marking. Your second qualification marking is now complete and the remaining open second qualification responses in your worklist have been removed. You can look at your submitted second qualification responses at any time by selecting the relevant worklist.
auto-approved-dialog.body-excess-stm-standardisation-response: You have been automatically approved to start live marking. Your second qualification marking is now complete and the remaining open second qualification responses in your worklist have been removed. You can look at your submitted second qualification responses at any time by selecting the relevant worklist.

atypical.search-button-tooltip: Search for an atypical response to mark
atypical.centre-search-tooltip: Please enter a centre number to search for
atypical.candidate-search-tooltip: Please enter a candidate number to search for

atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-suspended: You cannot get new responses until you have received feedback on your marking from your Team Leader
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-0: No expected candidate for this paper matches the details entered. Please check the centre and candidate numbers and try again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-10: No expected candidate for this paper matches the details entered. Please check the centre and candidate numbers and try again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-4: No expected candidate for this paper matches the details entered. Please check the centre and candidate numbers and try again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-5: The response associated with this candidate is not atypical. Please check the centre and candidate numbers and try again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-6: You are not eligible to mark papers from this centre. Please check the centre number and try again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-7: This response was previously removed from your worklist by your awarding body, so it cannot be allocated to you again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-2: This response is already in your worklist
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-3: This response is already in your worklist
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-8: This response has already been allocated to another examiner.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-9: You previously rejected this response, so it cannot be allocated to you again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-1: The response for centre {0}, candidate {1} belongs to {2}. Please confirm whether you would like to mark it now, move it to your worklist to mark later, or cancel and don't download it.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-disabled: You are not in an approved state for all the QIGs that make up this paper and are no longer allowed to perform this action.

action-buttons.allocate-button-not-approved-tooltip: You cannot download further responses until you have received feedback on your marking from your team leader.
action-buttons.submit-button-not-approved-tooltip: You cannot submit responses until you have received feedback on your marking from your team leader.
action-buttons.allocate-button-tooltip: Select number of responses to download

no-responses-available-helper.body: There are currently no responses available to download for marking. Please check again later.

marking-target-complete-helper.body: You have completed your marking target for this QIG and cannot download any more responses.

empty-worklist-helper.body-line-1: Your worklist is empty. Before you can start marking you need to download some responses.
empty-worklist-helper.body-line-2: Clicking the 'New responses' button will download responses to your limit of {0} open responses.
empty-worklist-helper.body-line-3: Note that if you have open re-marks that do not have a quota these will also count towards your open response limit and may prevent you from downloading more live responses.

worklist-headers.stm-standardisation: STM Standardisation marking DO NOT TRANSLATE

submit-response-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to submit this response?
submit-response-dialog.body-simulation: Are you sure  you want to submit this response? The response marks shall not be saved or visible after submission.

submit-all-responses-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to submit all marked responses?
submit-all-responses-dialog.body-simulation: Are you sure you want to submit all marked responses? The response marks shall not be saved or visible after submission.

response-submission-error-dialog.body-single-response-not-submitted: This response could not be submitted. Please review your worklist and try again.
response-submission-error-dialog.body-some-responses-not-submitted: Some responses could not be submitted. Please review your worklist and try again.
response-submission-error-dialog.body-single-response-already-submitted: This response could not be submitted because it has already been submitted previously.
response-submission-error-dialog.body-some-responses-already-submitted: One or more responses could not be submitted because they have already been submitted previously.

not-approved-helper.body-line-1: After submission of your first qualification responses: please wait for some feedback from a team leader, who will also offer you a second set of qualification responses to complete. For QIGs, please attempt to qualify or continue marking the other QIGs unless instructed not to do so by the IB.
not-approved-helper.body-line-2: After submission of your second qualification responses: unless you hear from IB Cardiff within 24 hours, please assume that you will not be approved to mark this session. You can still view the definitive marks by clicking on the Qualification worklist on the left. For QIGs, please attempt to qualify or continue marking the other QIGs unless instructed not to do so by the IB.
not-approved-helper.header: Your marking is currently under review.

quality-feedback-dialog.body: You have submitted one or more seeds within tolerance. Should you wish to review your marking against the definitive marks, you can do so in the Submitted - Closed worklist.

request-marking-check-error-dialog.body-approval-status-changed: Your status has changed and you are no longer allowed to perform this action.
request-marking-check-error-dialog.body-withdrawn: You have been withdrawn from this QIG. This will not prevent you from marking other QIGs where you are approved to mark
request-marking-check-error-dialog.body-hierarchy-changed: Your role has changed and you are no longer allowed to perform this action.
request-marking-check-error-dialog.body-no-examiners-available: A marking check cannot be requested because there is no one in the marking hierarchy with the correct permissions to perform a check.
request-marking-check-error-dialog.body-session-closed: This action cannot be completed as the QIG is now closed for marking. Please choose another QIG to work on.

request-marking-check-menu.header: Please select the examiner(s) who you want to check your marks.

perform-marking-check.perform-marking-check-body-1: You have been asked to check the marks of one or more examiners. Select
perform-marking-check.perform-marking-check-body-2: to view and perform a marking check.

perform-marking-check-confirmation-dialo.body: Are you sure that you want to set the marking of {0} as checked? You will no longer be able to access their worklist.

list-view-column-headers.time-to-end-of-grace-period: Time to end of grace period

quality-feedback-helper.quality-feedback-outstanding: You have submitted a seed that is outside of tolerance. Please open the response to review the feedback and then use the 'Accept feedback' button to accept the feedback. When you have done this you will be able to continue marking.
quality-feedback-helper.quality-feedback-outstanding-and-suspend: You have submitted a seed that is outside of tolerance. Please open the response to review the feedback and then use the 'Accept feedback' button to accept the feedback. Once you have done this you will not be able to download or submit  further responses until your team leader has provided you with feedback about your marking.

simulation-helper.body-line-1: Your worklist is empty. Before you can start marking you need to download some responses. Any marking you enter in simulation mode will not be returned as live marks. When the simulation marking period ends, your simulation marking will be deleted automatically and you will not be able to refer back to it.
simulation-helper.body-line-2: Clicking the 'Get new response' button will download a simulation response into your worklist for you to mark.

worklist.submitted-editable-worklist-helper: You can edit the marks of the responses in this list until the end of grace period. Any changes you make will be automatically saved. When the grace period  for a response ends, it will automatically move to the closed list and marks will be returned to the IB.

exited-simulation-dialog.subheader-multiple-qigs: Standardisation setup is now complete for the following QIG(s):
exited-simulation-dialog.subheader-single-qig: Standardisation setup is now complete for the following QIG:
exited-simulation-dialog.body-multiple-qigs: You are now able to start Marking. Simulation mode will no longer be available for the above QIG(s).
exited-simulation-dialog.body-single-qig: You are now able to start Marking. Simulation mode will no longer be available for the above QIG.

autozoned-warning-dialog.body: Responses in this QIG have been automatically zoned. Please raise an exception if you see any content belonging to a question which is not associated with this QIG and cannot be marked.

complex-optionality.total-marks: This paper has a complex rubric. The total mark for this response will only be calculated once you have entered a mark for all question items and saved your changes by navigating away from it.

saving-marks-error-dialog.body-error-saving-marks-single-response: The marks and annotations you applied to this response could not be saved. Please review and apply any missing marks and annotations again.
saving-marks-error-dialog.body-error-saving-marks-multiple-respons: Marks and annotations could not be saved for the following response(s). Please review and apply any missing marks and annotations.
saving-marks-error-dialog.body-cannot-leave-response-partially-mar: As you have submitted this response, all question items must be marked. Please ensure that you have entered a mark for every question item.
saving-marks-error-dialog.body-response-removed-from-worklist: Response {0} has now been removed from your worklist and the changes cannot be saved.
saving-marks-error-dialog.body-must-annotate-all-pages-in-grace: As you have already submitted this response, you cannot navigate away until you place at least one annotation on every page, or use the 'Mark as seen' button in full response view to confirm that you have viewed the content of each page.
saving-marks-error-dialog.body-grace-period-expired-changes-not-sa: Any changes you made to the marks and annotations of response {0} were not saved because the grace period has expired. This response has now been moved to your Submitted - closed worklist.

complete-button-dialog.body: This will enter a mark of NR for all unmarked question items. Do you wish to continue?

supervisor-remark-decision.originalmarks: Original marks: Original marks as final marks
supervisor-remark-decision.popout-body: Please select which set of marks you want to assign as the final marks, and reason.

previous-marks.people-icon: Choose which marks and annotations to show

on-page-comment-box.side-view-icon-tooltip: View comments at the side of the response

mark-scheme-panel.reset-mark-button-tooltip: Reset mark and annotations for this question item
mark-scheme-panel.optionality-tooltip: This response contains optional questions. Marks awarded will be struck through for all question items that will not be included in the total mark according to the mark scheme.
mark-scheme-panel.complete-button-tooltip-when-enabled: Enter a mark of NR for all unmarked question items
mark-scheme-panel.complete-button-tooltip-when-disabled: You can only use this button if you have entered a mark or NR against enough questions to meet the minimum optionality requirements for this response.  If the candidate has not responded to enough question(s) please enter NR against one or more before selecting the complete button.
mark-scheme-panel.unzoned-indicator-tooltip: No content has been assigned to this question item
mark-scheme-panel.link-indicator-tooltip: Page(s) have been linked to this question item

invalid-mark-dialog.body-numeric: Please enter a mark between {0} and {1}

mba-max-mark-exceeded-dialog.body: Adding this annotation would cause the maximum mark of {0} for this question item to be exceeded. The annotation has not been applied.

reset-mark-dialog.body-when-mark-deleted: You have reset the marks originally awarded, do you want to remove the annotations as well?
reset-mark-dialog.body-when-reset-button-clicked: This will reset the mark and remove all annotations for the associated question item. Are you sure you want to do this?

end-of-list-dialog.body: You have reached the last response in your worklist. Would you like to go back to your worklist?

delete-comment-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

annotation-toolbar-helper.body-before-adding-stamp: Drag the annotations you use regularly into this panel. These annotations will then be visible at all times without having to expand the full toolbar. You must drag at least one annotation into the toolbar to continue marking.
annotation-toolbar-helper.body-after-adding-stamp: When you have finished adding annotations to your favourites toolbar, use this button to collapse the full list of annotations and start marking. You can expand the toolbar again by selecting this button.
annotation-toolbar-helper.body-before-adding-stamp-with-overlays: Note that you cannot drag the overlay tools here.

accept-quality-feedback-dialog.body: Please confirm that you have reviewed and accepted the quality feedback for this response.

stamps.stamp_3206: Labelling is wrong or missing, e.g. axis labels

discard-message-or-exception-dialog.body: If you open a new message changes to the existing one will be discarded. Are you sure you want continue? You will lose your unsaved changes?

raise-exception-panel.exception-type-label: I am raising an exception for the following reason:
raise-exception-panel.open-exception-exists-against-response: There is already an open exception of this type against this response
raise-exception-panel.open-exception-exists-against-question: There is already an open exception of this type against this question
raise-exception-panel.incorrect-component-or-paper-additional-: Please note that if the response is moved to correct component it will no longer appear in your list of responses to mark.
raise-exception-panel.file-cannot-be-accessed-or-read-addition: Please note that if this file is removed in order for another one to be uploaded in its place, it is likely that you will not receive this same response again for marking and any marking would unfortunately be lost.
raise-exception-panel.new-exception-subtitle-has-unmanagedslao: I am unable to mark this response due to the following reason:

exception-list-panel.open-blocking-exception-tooltip: You will not be able to submit the response until the exception has been resolved and closed
exception-list-panel.exception-blocker-resolved: You will not be able to submit the response until you have closed the exception

reject-rig-confirmation-dialog.body: Rejecting this response will put it back into the pool for someone else to mark; you will not be able to download it again. You should only do this if you believe you know the candidate, or your awarding body has advised you of other cases where you should reject a response. Are you sure you want to continue?

discard-exception-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to discard this exception without submitting?
discard-exception-dialog.body-navigate-away: Are you sure you want to navigate from this page as the exception is unsaved and will be discarded?
discard-exception-dialog.body-raise-new: Are you sure you want to discard your existing unsubmitted exception?
discard-exception-dialog.body-open-another: Opening a new exception would discard the changes to the existing one. Are you sure you want to lose your unsaved changes?

close-exception-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to close this exception?

eur-marks-change-popout.body: Please explain why you have changed the marks for this response

leaving-response-warning-dialog.body: Please review the following before leaving this response:

submit-response-warning-dialog.body: Please review the following before submitting this response:

leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.not-all-pages-annotated: Not all pages are annotated. You will be unable to submit the response until you either place at least one annotation on every page, or use the 'Mark as seen' button in full response view to confirm that you have viewed the content of each page.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.not-all-pages-annotated-in-grace: You cannot leave this response and save your changes until you either place at least one annotation on every page, or use the 'Mark as seen' button in full response view to confirm that you have viewed the content of each page.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.eur-mark-change-reason-not-applied: You will be unable to submit the response until you explain why you have changed the marks.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.eur-mark-change-reason-not-applied-in-gr: You cannot leave this response and save your changes until you explain why you have changed the marks.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.message-will-be-discarded: The message you are currently writing will be discarded.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.exception-will-be-discarded: The exception you are currently raising will be discarded.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.not-all-slaos-annotated: Not all additional pages are annotated. You will be unable to submit the response until you place at least one annotation on every additional page.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.not-all-slaos-annotated-in-grace: You cannot leave this response and save your changes until you place at least one annotation on every additional page.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.supervisor-remark-decision-not-applied: You will be unable to submit the response until you select a set of marks to use as the candidate's final mark.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.supervisor-remark-decision-not-applied-i: You cannot leave this response and save your changes until you select a set of marks to use as the candidate's final mark.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.all-questions-marked-nr: All question items in this response have been assigned a 'No response' (NR) mark which implies that the candidate has not attempted any of the questions.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.questions-marked-nr: 'No response' (NR) has been assigned to one or more items included in the total mark. This implies that the candidate has not followed the rubric.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.questions-marked-nr-used-in-total: A 'No response' (NR) mark has been assigned to one or more mandatory question items. This implies that the candidate has not attempted these questions.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.questions-marked-not-used-in-total: Marks have been assigned to one or more items that are not included in the total mark. This implies that the candidate has not followed the rubric.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.enhanced-off-page-comment-will-be-discar: Changes you have made to the selected comment will be discarded.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.not-all-files-viewed: Not all files associated with the current response have been viewed. You will be unable to submit the response until you have viewed all the files.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.file-downloaded-outside: Please ensure that you have closed any files you have downloaded and opened outside of Assessor for this response.

media-player.file-to-play-icon-tooltip: Select version of file to play
media-player.download-transcoded-icon-tooltip: Download transcoded version of this file
media-player.browser-not-supported-error: Your browser is not able to play the audio/video file. Please make sure you are using a supported device and browser

media-player-error-dialog.body-audio-network-error: There was a problem with the connection when trying to load the audio file. Please try selecting the file again.
media-player-error-dialog.body-audio-generic-error: There was a problem loading the audio file. Please try selecting the file again. If the issue persists, please try
media-player-error-dialog.body-video-network-error: There was a problem with the connection when trying to load the video file. Please try selecting the file again.
media-player-error-dialog.body-video-generic-error: There was a problem loading the video file. Please try selecting the file again. If the issue persists, please try
media-player-error-dialog.quick-link-play-alternate: You can also try playing the

delete-enhanced-off-page-comment-confirm.body: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

discard-enhanced-off-page-comment-confir.body: Are you sure you want to discard the changes you have made to this comment?

discard-new-enhanced-off-page-comment-co.body: Are you sure you want to discard this comment?

discard-enhanced-off-page-comment-other-.body: If you select a different set of comments, the comment you are currently editing will be discarded. Are you sure you want to continue?

ecoursework-unsupported-file-placeholder.line-1: This file cannot be viewed within RM Assessor
ecoursework-unsupported-file-placeholder.line-2: It can be downloaded and opened on your computer.

share-confirmation-popup.content: Are you sure you want to stop sharing this overlay with all examiners?

ebookmarking.unzoned-images-placeholder: No content has been assigned to this question item.

zoning-warning-dialog.body: The zoning of this candidate's script is being reviewed following an exception raised against another response. Please be aware that the image zones displayed may be changed as a result of this exception. Please select other responses to mark until this exception is resolved.

script-page.suppressed-page-tooltip: This page cannot be viewed as it is not relevant to the candidate's response and it may contain information that identifies them

full-response-view.all-pages-annotated-text-full-response: All pages of this response have been annotated
full-response-view.all-pages-annotated-text-no-pages-to-dis: There are no unannotated pages to display

page-linking-popup.header: Please choose question item(s) to link this page to

unlink-annotations-exist-dialog.body: You may not unlink the following question item(s) because there are annotations related to them on this page. Please remove the annotations before unlinking.

manage-slaos-dialog.body: This candidate's response contains additional pages that are not part of the main answer booklet. Please review these pages carefully. Once you have either linked each page to one or more question items, or flagged it as "Seen", you will be able to start marking the response.

slaos-managed-dialog.body: All additional pages have been linked to a question item or flagged as "Seen". Would you like to start marking this response now?

slao-link-removal-dialog.body: By removing all links from this page you are confirming that this page does not contain anything that would count towards the candidate's mark for this response. If this is correct please select "OK". Otherwise please select "Cancel" and then link it to the question item(s) it relates to.

manage-slaos-remark-dialog.body: This candidate's response contains additional pages that are not part of the main answer booklet. The original examiner has already reviewed these and either linked them to question item(s) or flagged them as "Seen". Please review these pages and links carefully, and make adjustments if required, before you start reviewing and adjusting the original marks.

flag-as-seen-dialog.body: By selecting "OK" you are confirming that this page does not contain anything that would count towards the candidate's mark for this response. If this is correct please select "OK". Otherwise please select "Cancel" and then link it to the question item(s) it relates to.

full-response-view.all-additional-pages-annotated-text-full: All additional pages of this response have been annotated
full-response-view.all-additional-pages-annotated-text-no-p: There are no unannotated additional pages to display

unknown-content-link-removal-dialog.body: By removing all links from this page you are confirming that this page does not contain anything that would count towards the candidate's mark for this response. If this is correct please select "OK". Otherwise please select "Cancel" and then link it to the question item(s) it relates to.

ebookmarking-flag-as-seen-dialog.body: By selecting "OK" you are confirming that the unassigned content on this page does not contain anything that would count towards the candidate's mark for this response. If this is correct please select "OK". Otherwise please select "Cancel" and then link it to the question item(s) it relates to.

unknown-content-dialog.body: This candidate's response contains pages or parts of pages that have not been assigned to a question item. Please review these pages carefully to validate whether they apply to any question(s) for which you will be submitting marks. Once you have either linked each page to one or more question items, or marked as "Seen", you will be able to start marking the response.

unknown-content-managed-dialog.body: All pages with unknown content have been linked to a question item or marked as "Seen". Would you like to start marking this response now?

unknown-content-dialog-in-remark.body: This candidate's response contains pages or parts of pages that have not been assigned to a question item. The original examiner has already reviewed these and either linked them to question item(s) or marked them as "Seen". Please review these pages and links carefully, and make adjustments if required, before you start reviewing the original marks.

busy-indicator.savingMarksAndAnnotations: Saving marks and annotations. Please wait...
busy-indicator.savingMarksAndAnnotations-offline: Assessor 3 is attempting to save your work, but you are currently offline. Please check your Internet connection. Once a connection is established your work will automatically be saved. Please do not close your browser or you will lose any unsaved changes.

error-dialog.body: This action could not be completed. Please try again, and contact emarking@ibo.org if the issue persists.
error-dialog.body-error-saving-user-options: Sorry, the changes you made to user settings could not be saved. Please open the user menu and try again.
error-dialog.body-network-error: Network error. Cannot connect to server.
error-dialog.body-response-removed: For your information response ID {0} has been removed  for question group {1}.

browser-warnings.close-browser-warning: Please use the 'Logout' button to log out of Assessor 3 and ensure your work is saved. If you close the browser without logging out any unsaved work will be lost.

offline-dialog.body: This action cannot be completed because Assessor 3 cannot communicate with the server. Please check your Internet connection and try again. To avoid losing work, please don't log out or close your browser until you are back online.
offline-dialog.body-user-options-changed: Assessor 3 cannot communicate with the server to save your preferences and log out. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
offline-dialog.body-application-files-not-downloaded: This action cannot be completed because RM Assessor{0} cannot communicate with the server. Please check your Internet connection. Once you are back online you will be automatically taken to the area you were trying to access. To avoid losing work, please don't close your browser.

approval-statuses.status-changed: Your approval status on this question group has changed and you cannot download or submit responses until your team leader provides you with feedback. You can still review any responses which have already been downloaded into your worklist. This will not prevent you from marking other QIGs where you have a target.
approval-statuses.status-changed-qualityfeedback: Your approval status on this question group has changed and you cannot download or submit responses until you have accepted feedback on this seed, and your team leader has provided you with further feedback about your marking. This will not prevent you from marking other QIGs where you have a target.

worklisttype.esTeamApproval: ES Team Approval DO NOT TRANSLATE

1.name: Colour Image Request
1.details: I am unable to mark the candidate's response because the image is unclear.  I would like to request a colour version of this image as I believe this will make it clearer.  I do not need the whole script to be scanned again.  Examples include use of pale coloured writing implements or a graphical response that is difficult to read.  Please note that a colour image request may take up to 24 hours to be delivered and may take longer to download and mark due to the increased image processing required.

2.name: Image Rescan Request
2.details: Raise for: DP exam papers only Escalated to: RM Raise when: Image is unreadable or of poor quality, image is not correctly aligned, page folded during scanning. Next step: Once RM replies, the exception must be closed before the response can be submitted.

3.name: Suspected Academic Misconduct
3.details: Raise for: Any component Escalated to: IB Raise when: Plagiarism or other misconduct is suspected. Next step: Mark and submit response as usual, making no adjustment due to suspected misconduct.

4.name: Offensive Content
4.details: Raise for: Any component Escalated to: IB Raise when: Candidate's response is considered offensive, obscene or inappropriate. Next step: Mark and submit response as usual, making no adjustment for inappropriate content

5.name: Material of Concern
5.details: Raise for: Any component Escalated to: IB Raise when: Response leads to concern over the candidate's wellbeing. Next step: Mark and submit response as usual, making no adjustment for concerns.

6.name: Incorrect Question Paper
6.details: I cannot mark this item because the image does not correspond to the question paper I am marking.

7.name: Undecipherable
7.details: I am unable to mark the candidate's response because the response is undecipherable.  A further rescan will not improve the situation because the problem is with the writing and not the image.  Examples include poor handwriting or overwriting the original response.

8.name: Answer outside of Guidance
8.details: Raise for: Any component  Escalated to: Your Team Leader Raise when: Markscheme or criteria does not cover the candidate's response. Next step: Once your Team Leader replies, the exception must be closed before the response can be submitted

9.name: Misclassified
9.details: Unable to mark because I suspect that part of the response belongs to a different candidate or has been otherwise misclassified.

10.name: Concatenated Response Exception
10.details: Raise for: DP exam papers Escalated to: RM Raise when: Response contains the work of two or more candidates Next step: Do not continue to mark response. Once RM replies, the exception must be closed before the response can be submitted.

11.name: Response Contains Coversheet Only
11.details: Raise for: DP exam papers Escalated to: RM Raise when: Only the coversheet is present. Next step: Do not continue to mark response. Once RM replies, the exception must be closed before the response can be submitted.

12.name: Incorrect Component or Paper
12.details: Raise for: DP exam papers Escalated to: RM Raise when: Response doesn't correspond to the component/paper/QIG you are marking. Next step: Do not continue to mark response. RM will notify you when the response is removed from your worklist.

13.name: Non-Script Object
13.details: Raise for: DP exam papers Escalated to: IB Raise when: Irrelevant items are scanned with a candidate's examination, such as an attendance register or seating plan. Next step: Mark and submit response as usual, making no adjustment due to other items present.

14.name: Image cannot be accessed or read
14.details: Raise for: School uploaded eCoursework, MYP on-screen examinations Escalated to: IB Raise when: Parts, or the whole response cannot be viewed. Next step: Do not continue to mark response. Once the IB replies, the exception must be closed before the response can be submitted.

15.name: Candidate Welfare Concern
15.details: I have concerns about this candidate's response. I would like this to be investigated.

16.name: Malpractice Concern
16.details: I suspect malpractice in relation to this candidate's response. I would like this to be reviewed.

17.name: PA Referral
17.details: I have a problem marking this response, which cannot be resolved with my team leaders's help.

18.name: Zoning Error Missing Content
18.details: Raise for: DP exam papers only Escalated to: RM Raise when: Some of the candidate's response cannot be seen/the candidate has continued their answer outside  the given response area. Next step: Do not continue to mark response. Once RM replies, the exception must be closed before the response can be submitted.

19.name: Zoning Error Other Content
19.details: The zone for this question contains response content relating to another question within this script.

20.name: Mark Scheme Query
20.details: Unable to zone because the mark scheme does not appear to match this candidate's responses.

21.name: Supervisory Concerns other than Hours Spent
21.details: Raise for: DP extended essays Escalated to: IB Raise when: Comments are omitted or there are concerns about the information contained within the comment. Details must be provided. Next step: Mark and submit response as usual, making no adjustment due to concerns.

22.name: Violation of a Policy
22.details: Raise for: School uploaded eCoursework Escalated to: IB Raise when: An IB policy has been violated, such as a breach of the Animal Experimentation policy Next step: Mark and submit response as usual, making no adjustment for concerns.

23.name: Violation of Ethical or Subject-Specific Guidelines
23.details: Raise for: School uploaded eCoursework Escalated to: IB Raise when: Ethical or subject-specific guidelines have been violated. Next step: Mark and submit response as usual, making no adjustment due to concerns.

24.name: Incorrect file
24.details: Raise for: School uploaded eCoursework Escalated to: IB Raise when: School has uploaded a file not relevant to the component. Next step: Do not continue to mark response. Once the IB replies, the exception must be closed before the response can be submitted.

25.name: File access error
25.details: Raise for: School uploaded eCoursework Escalated to: IB Raise when: Response being marked contains a file that does not open. Next step: Do not continue to mark response. Once the IB replies, the exception must be closed before the response can be submitted.

26.name: Incorrect Image
26.details: Raise for: MYP on-screen examinations Escalated to: IB Raise when: Response is not correctly associated with a particular QIG. Next step: Once the IB replies, the exception must be closed before the response can be submitted.

27.name: Incomplete coursework
27.details: Raise for: School uploaded eCoursework Escalated to: IB Raise when: Pages seem to be missing from the uploaded response. Next step: Do not continue to mark response. Once the IB replies, the exception must be closed before the response can be submitted.

28.name: Work not following course requirements
28.details: Raise for: School uploaded eCoursework Escalated to: IB Raise when: Candidate produced work for the wrong level, for last year's/next year's course or the work does not fulfil the criteria for the course. Next step: Do not continue to mark response. Once the IB replies, the exception must be closed before the response can be submitted.

29.name: General Coursework Exception
29.details: Raise for: School uploaded eCoursework Escalated to: IB Raise when: For all other coursework issues. Next step: Do not continue to mark response. Once the IB replies, the exception must be closed before the response can be submitted.

30.name: Missing Letter for External Institute
30.details: Raise for: DP extended essays Escalated to: IB Raise when: Research took place at an institution other than the school and there is no accompanying letter. Next step: Mark and submit response as usual, making no adjustment for the missing letter.

31.name: Issue accessing file
31.details: I am experiencing problems accessing a file related to this response and require Awarding Body assistance to resolve this and to allow me to carry on marking.

32.name: Missing and/or Incorrect File
32.details: I believe one or more files related to this candidate response is incorrect, or are missing, preventing me from completing marking.

33.name: Word count exceeded
33.details: The candidate's evidence has exceeded the stipulated word count  by more than 10%

34.name: Additional material - Missing
34.details: The candidate has not submitted the required Resource, Research Evidence or Processed Information Sheet(s).

35.name: Additional material - Word/page count exceeded
35.details: The candidate has exceeded the word/page count for Resource, Research Evidence or Processed information Sheet(s).

36.name: Additional material - Significant copying
36.details: The candidate has copied extended pieces of text/narrative from the Resource Sheet, Research or Processed Information Sheet(s).

37.name: General Exception A
37.details: Use as detailed in Marking Instructions

38.name: General Exception B
38.details: Use as detailed in Marking Instructions

cookie-panel.message-part-1: RM Assessor{0} uses cookies to deliver an efficient and reliable marking experience for you. Full details of what cookies are and why we use them can be found by reading our
cookie-panel.message-part-2: page. Please note that by continuing to use this site you are consenting to the use of cookies.
cookie-panel.message-part-2-cookies-disabled: page. We have detected that cookies are currently disabled in your browser - this will prevent you from logging in. Please adjust your browser settings to enable cookies before you try to log in.
cookie-panel.dont-show-again: Don't show me this message again
cookie-panel.cookies-link-tooltip: View information about the cookies RM Assessor 3 uses

cookie-detail-page.cookie-page-cookie-purpose: Determines whether the user has chosen to permanently hide the cookie notification panel
cookie-detail-page.cookies-on-this-site-part-1: In order for this site to work properly your computer needs to accept a number of cookies; without them some fundamental parts of the website won't work as intended.
cookie-detail-page.cookies-on-this-site-part-2: The cookies used on this site include:
cookie-detail-page.what-are-cookies-part-1: Cookies are small text files which are sent to and then stored on your computer when you visit different web pages. We do not store detailed personal information in our cookies, but we use information gathered from cookies to help make your experience on the site better, e.g. by making navigation within the site easier or remembering your preferences. Please note that cookies can't harm your computer or your files.
cookie-detail-page.what-are-cookies-part-2: Cookies are either "session cookies", which are only stored for the duration of your visit to the site and deleted when you close your browser, or "persistent cookies", which are stored for a period of time and activated when you return to the site. In general, session cookies are often used for authentication, and persistent cookies are often used to save your preferences.
cookie-detail-page.session-id-cookie-purpose: Used for denying multiple user logins from different instance of the same browser.

forgot-password-dialog.body: This will open a new browser window or tab. Do you want to continue?

response-data.amd-tooltip: The total difference between the marks awarded and the definitive marks set by the senior examiner team, calculated across each individual question item
response-data.tmd-tooltip: The difference between the overall total mark awarded, and the overall total mark set by the senior examiner team
response-data.exceptions-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more linked exceptions. None of these will prevent the response being submitted when marking is complete. Click icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.blocking-exceptions-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more linked exceptions. The marker will not be able to submit the response until these exceptions have been resolved and closed. Click icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.resolved-exceptions-icon-tooltip: This response has {0} exceptions that are resolved and waiting to be closed. None of these will prevent the response being submitted when marking is complete. Click icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.resolved-and-blocking-exceptions-icon-to: This response has {0} exceptions that are resolved and waiting to be closed. The marker will not be able to submit the response until they have closed these exceptions. Click icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.messages-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more linked messages.
response-data.unread-messages-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more unread linked messages.
response-data.mark-change-reason-not-specified-icon-to: No reason for marks change has been entered.
response-data.zoning-exceptions-icon-tooltip: The zoning of this candidate's script is being reviewed following an exception raised against another response. Please be aware that the image zones displayed may be changed as a result of this exception. The examiner will not be able to submit this response until this exception is resolved.

change-status-error-dialog.body-already-changed: The examiner status has been already changed.
change-status-error-dialog.body-not-allowed: Your role has changed and you are no longer allowed to perform this action.

hierarchy-changed-dialog.body-priority-changed: Your position in the hierarchy has changed and this is no longer an available action.
hierarchy-changed-dialog.body-hierarchy-changed: Your role has changed and you are no longer allowed to perform this action.
hierarchy-changed-dialog.HierarchyChanged-content: Your role has changed and you are no longer allowed to perform this action.

lock-failure-dialog.body: The lock status of this examiner has been changed and you are no longer allowed to perform this action.

subordinate-withdrawn-dialog.SubordinateExaminerWithdrawn-content: This examiner has been withdrawn from this question group and this is no longer an available action.

withdrawn-dialog.Withdrawn-content: You have been withdrawn from this QIG. This will not prevent you from marking other QIGs where you are approved to mark

suspended-dialog.Suspended-content: Your status has changed and you are no longer allowed to perform this action.

lock-limit-reached-dialog.LockLimitReached-content: You have already locked the maximum number of examiners allowed. Please manage your existing locked examiners before you lock another examiner.

already-reviewed-dialog.body: This response is already reviewed by another examiner.

supervisor-remark-mark-later-confirmatio.body: Re-mark request successfully created. The response is now available for marking in your Supervisor re-mark worklist.

supervisor-remark-panel.supervisor-remark-already-raised: Please note, a supervisor re-mark has already been raised for this response, either by you or another senior examiner.

sampling-error-dialog-already-sampled.body: This response has been sampled by another supervisor. Please select OK and then re-open the response to view the updated sampling status.

sampling-error-dialog-withdrawn.body: You have been withdrawn from this QIG. This will not prevent you from marking other QIGs where you are approved to mark

sampling-error-dialog-subordinate-withdr.body: This examiner has been withdrawn from this question group and this is no longer an available action.

sampling-error-dialog-hierarchy-changed.body: Your role has changed and you are no longer allowed to perform this action.

promote-to-seed-dialog.body-own-response: Promoting this response to a seed will remove it from your marking worklist and it will be available in Standardisation Setup.
promote-to-seed-dialog.body-stm-subordinate-response: Promoting this response to a seed will remove it from the current examiner's worklist and it will be available in Standardisation Setup.
promote-to-seed-dialog.body-non-stm-subordinate-response: By promoting this response to a seed it will remain in the current examiner's worklist and it will also be available in Standardisation Setup.
promote-to-seed-dialog.body-not-fully-marked: This response must be 100%% marked before it can be promoted to a seed.
promote-to-seed-dialog.body-remarks-exist: The following re-marks exist for this response:
promote-to-seed-dialog.body-dynamic-sampling: By promoting this response to a seed it will remain in your marking worklist and it will also be available in Standardisation Setup.

promote-to-seed-no-seeding-dialog.body: The response cannot be promoted to seed as examiners have not been assigned a seeding rate or seeding frequency and the Standardisation seed target is set as zero.

promote-to-seed-examiner-withdrawn-dialo.body: This examiner has been withdrawn from this question group and this is no longer an available action.

promote-to-reuse-bucket-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to promote the selected response to re-use list?

promote-to-reuse-bucket-not-latest-marks.body: The response you have selected is not the latest set of marks awarded for this candidate and therefore cannot be promoted to the re-use list

create-exception-withdrawn-response-dial.body: The response related to this exception has been removed from your worklist due to Quality Control checks, and therefore this exception will not be submitted.  On clicking OK the open response will also close and will no longer be visible in your worklist.

withdrawn-response-dialog.body: This action could not be completed due to a change that has been made to this response by an administrator. Please try again, or try logging out and back in if the problem persists.

1.subject: Auto Approval
1.content: Following successful qualification, you have been auto approved for QIG {0} and can start live marking. You may receive additional feedback from your team leader at a later date.

2.subject: Team Member Auto Approved
2.content: Following successful qualification on QIG {0}, I have been auto approved.

4.subject: Conditional Auto Approval
4.content: Following successful qualification, you have been conditionally auto approved for QIG {0}.DO NOT TRANSLATE You may now start live marking upto the conditional approval limit set by your reviewer.DO NOT TRANSLATE You will be fully approved at a later date by your reviewer. DO NOT TRANSLATE

5.subject: Team Member Conditionally Approved DO NOT TRANSLATE
5.content: Following successful qualification, I have been conditionally approved for QIG {0}. I can mark live scripts upto the conditional approval limit but require you to fully approve me.DO NOT TRANSLATE

6.subject: RefreshMarkingTeam
6.content: Marker Conditionally Approved for QIG {0}.DO NOT TRANSLATE

7.subject: Pending Review
7.content: Your status has been changed to Pending Review for QIG {0} due to submitting inaccurate responses. You may receive additional feedback from your reviewer at a later date.

8.subject: Team Member Auto Suspended
8.content: I have been stopped from marking due to submitting inaccurate responses on QIG {0}.

10.subject: Please check my marking DO NOT TRANSLATE
10.content: I have given you access to view my Live marking worklist for {0}.Please review my marking and if you agree I have marked my responses correctly please indicate you have checked my work. DO NOT TRANSLATE If you have any comments or concerns about my marking please discuss this with me. DO NOT TRANSLATE

11.subject: Marks CheckedDO NOT TRANSLATE
11.content: I have checked your marks for Session Name to be filled. DO NOT TRANSLATE

12.subject: Review Re-mark Completed DO NOT TRANSLATE
12.content: I have completed all the Review Re-marks requested.DO NOT TRANSLATE

13.subject: Refresh Marking Targets
13.content: Your marking target(s) for {0} have been updated. The following targets are affected: {1}.

14.subject: Grace period updated
14.content: Please note that the grace period of {0} has been changed to {2} hours. This means that any responses submitted before the time of this message will stay pending after submission for {1} hours; any submitted after the time of this message will close {2} hours after submission.

16.subject: Zoning Exception Raised
16.content: The Zoning of a candidate response ID {0} in your closed worklist is being reviewed following an exception raised by another examiner. Please be aware that the image zones displayed may be changed as a result of this exception. You will be notified when this has been resolved at which point you should review your submitted response and check that the marks you had awarded are still appropriate. Should you find this not to be the case then please contact the IB as soon as possible.

17.subject: Zoning Exception Resolved
17.content: The Zoning of a candidate response ID {0} in your closed worklist has been resolved following an exception raised by another examiner. This may have changed the zones for the response items you have marked.  Please review your submitted response and check that the marks you had awarded are still appropriate. Should you find this not to be the case then please contact the IB as soon as possible.

18.subject: Team Member Status Update
18.content: I have updated the approval status of {0} from {1} to {2}

19.subject: Notification of Change for Display ID {0}
19.content-removed: For your information, Display ID {0} has been removed from your worklist due to quality checks.
19.content-replaced: For your information, Display ID {0} has been put back in your worklist following quality checks, thanks for your time.
19.content-permanently-removed: For your information, Display ID {0} has been permanently removed from your worklist following quality checks, sorry for any inconvenience caused.

20.subject: Locked Examiner Withdrawn
20.content: I have been withdrawn from marking on QIG {0}, and therefore no longer need action taken from the Approval Management worklist.

21.subject: RIG Removed
21.content: For your information, Display ID {0} has been removed from your worklist for QIG {1}

22.subject: Notification of Change to Marking Instructions document
22.content: A new version of the Marking Instructions for {0} has been made available. DO NOT TRANSLATE Please ensure you download and use this version instead of the previous one. DO NOT TRANSLATE

23.subject: Response removed from worklist for {0}
23.content: Please be Informed that one or more responses have been de-allocated from your worklist for the component-{0}

24.subject: RIG {0} is de-allocated
24.content: The RIG {0} has been de-allocated from your worklist due to quality checks.

25.subject: Notification of Change to Marking Instructions document DO NOT TRANSLATE
25.content: A new Marking Instructions file for {0} has been made available.DO NOT TRANSLATE Please ensure you view this in your Marking Instructions worklist. DO NOT TRANSLATE

26.subject: Notification for re-mark removal
26.content: This is to inform you that Display ID {0} has been removed from your re-mark work list for question item {1}.

27.subject: Notification of response moved from worklist
27.content: The Response - {0} in your {1} worklist with open exception(s) of '{2}' has been taken by your team leader {3} and moved to the {1} worklist of {3} for further marking. You can no longer access this response in your {1} worklist for viewing or marking.
